name: Grachtenhuis (Demo)
description:
You are a muis (mouse) on a boot (boat) in the Amsterdam Canal District of The Netherlands. The kaasmollen (cheese windmill) has spilled its kaas (cheese) into the grachten (canals)! Oh no!

Collect as much cheese in the grachten as you can before it sinks and deliver it to the kaasmollen at the top right to end the game!

Control boat by left-click-holding the mouse and point to direction of movement.

Windmill to deliver cheese to is in top right corner of screen. Deliver when done collecting or all remaining cheese has sunk!

Enjoy! (Welcome to feedback!)
